channel.title: CVE Feed for EverPress -- Mailster
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EverPress -- Mailster

item.title: CVE-2024-30503|2024-08-02T01:38:59.646Z -- everpress -- mailster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-32523|2024-08-02T02:13:39.675Z -- everpress -- mailster
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-37433|2024-07-22T08:24:05.633Z -- everpress -- mailster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-30503|2024-06-04T17:38:43.651Z -- everpress -- mailster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-32523|2024-06-04T17:50:18.289Z -- everpress -- mailster
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in EverPress Mailster allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Mailster: from n/a through 4.0.6.
